elementSpec.desc: marks the individual volumes of a reference edition.

exemplum.eg: <(La)vol n="2"><!-- text of edition La, volume 2 --> <(La)page n="32"> <!-- text of edition La, vol. 2, page 32 --></(La)page> <(La)page n="33"> <!-- text of edition La, vol. 2, page 33 --></(La)page> <(La)page n="34"> <!-- text of edition La, vol. 2, page 34 --></(La)page> <(La)page n="35"> <!-- text of edition La, vol. 2, page 35 --></(La)page> </(La)vol>

remarks.p: May contain character data and page elements.

The vol may be used if the reference edition has more than one volume; otherwise it need not be used. Any data contained within a vol element but not within a page element is assumed not to appear in the edition from which the reference scheme derives.
